title: What do I do about my speakers
content:
A while ago the top speaker on my pixel 4 randomly started to sound tinny and blown out.
then a couple of weeks later it happened to the bottom left and today it happened to the bottom right.
I'm barely able to hear anything over the distortion. I haven't even owned the phone for a full year yet
I don't really know what to do or how to fix it. Any suggestions?
